experiences.description: I have worked on MultiProduct Billing Service Squad In which we integrate multiple product billing module to our backend service(micro-service architechture). I had a oppurtunity to build multiple features for our payment integration

I had the opportunity to work on a variety of tasks related to backend development,frontend development, database management. Throughout the internship, I gained hands-on experience with key technologies and best practices in modern software development.
